name: Elaneer (Tender Coconut Water)
history: Elaneer, or tender coconut water, is a popular natural beverage in India and other tropical regions. It is known for its hydrating properties and is often consumed for its health benefits.
description: Elaneer is the clear liquid inside young green coconuts. It's a refreshing and hydrating drink, rich in nutrients and electrolytes. It's often enjoyed as is or can be used as a base for various beverages and cocktails.

instructions.title: Select Tender Coconut
instructions.description: Choose a fresh tender coconut. The younger coconuts have more water and are sweeter compared to the older ones, which have thicker flesh.

instructions.title: Open the Coconut
instructions.description: Use a sharp knife to carefully cut open the top of the tender coconut. You can make a hole large enough to insert a straw or cut it more widely to access the coconut water and flesh.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Insert a straw into the coconut and enjoy the refreshing coconut water. You can also use a spoon to scoop out the tender coconut flesh and eat it.

tips: Store unopened tender coconuts in a cool place and consume them as soon as possible for the best taste.
You can also chill the coconut in a refrigerator before serving for a refreshing cold drink.
variations: Mix with other fruit juices or add to smoothies for a tropical flavor.
Use tender coconut water as a base for making cocktails or mocktails.

storage.instructions: Unopened tender coconuts can be stored at room temperature for a few days.

presentationTips: Serve in the coconut shell itself for an authentic and eco-friendly presentation.
Garnish with a slice of lime or a sprig of mint for added freshness.
